title: Unless the alternative location and size is at least similar to the location and size of the Development Plan as regards access, levels, etc
clause_text: Unless the alternative location and size is at least similar to the location and size of the Development Plan as regards access, levels, etc.; If the reservation is already relocated under these regulations;
section: 3.11 RELOCATION OF D.P. / R.P. SITES / ROADS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Unless the alternative location and size is at least similar to the location and size of the Development Plan as regards access, levels, etc.;
